modName: Larry and Tedd - Twin Bear Companion -BETA-
summary: Remember Tedd from Brown Bear Tedd from my other mod? Well say hello to his brother, Larry!
descriptionHtml:
[size=\"5\"][font=\"Arial Black\"][color=\"#FF0000\"]Larry and Tedd - Twin Bear Companion BETA[/color]

-Report all your bugs/suggestions in the comment section! 

-UPDATE V.1.2 (Mini)-
Changes : 
-Made the bear\'s size smaller in hopes of fixing that \"Unable to get past my bear in tight spaces\"
[/font][/size]
----------------------
[size=\"3\"]
Remember Tedd, the bear companion? People seemed to have enjoyed him so much that i decided to add in his twin brother, Larry! Just like before, after you download this mod, press \"T\" to wait for one hour and Larry / Tedd will appear before you. Larry is a white snow bear and Tedd is a Brown Bear. They will both fight for you and die for you! (Well they can\'t die)

This is still in Beta so if you find some bugs/glitches, report them here so that i can fix them.

Give me some suggestions in the comment box as well! Such as the size of the bear. Due to there being two bears, i actually made the sizes smaller than the original Brown Bear Tedd mod to decrease the chances of some major bug happening. 

Enjoy!
[/size]
author: sandmankim
